title:
Please anwser if you can. There are a lot of building new home in the Love Grove Comm. 

we only have one way in /out. How soon will the city prepare another way in and out for safety reason. We have alot of elderly here and the railroad crossing sometimes make it difficulty to leave for work , school and etc. THANK YOU for your time.
